channel.title: delivery on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in delivery on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Back up Artifact
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Why do we need artifacts? Track the project’s progress against the plan, making it easier to manage and control Future team members can learn from past projects, understanding the decisions made, the problems faced, and how they were solved Smoothen the handover and onboarding process, track record, and trace back if needed.

item.title: Project Delivery Schedule and Guidelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Weekly Activities Weekly Points/Effort Report Every Friday Action: Fill out the weekly points/effort report. Link: Weekly Report Spreadsheet. Deadline for Data Sync: Data is sync by EOD next Tuesday.
